articles.title: Unveiling the secrets of the universe in radio waves - BusinessLine
articles.description: Launched in 2018, MeerKAT is operated by the South African Radio Astronomy Observatory (SARAO), a national research facility funded by the Government of South Africa. MeerKAT was later integrated into the global Square Kilometre Array (SKA) initiative, which …
